snippet: At Pattycakes, a cake-supply store in Queens, the wares offer a remarkable account of how the borough’s immigrant population has shaped the city’s tastes.
abstract: Pattycakes cake-supply store in Jackson Heights, Queens, has to keep its products up to date to reflect the constantly changing immigrant population of the borough; store's wares offer a remarkable account of how the ever-shifting immigrant population of Queens has shaped the taste of the city.
lead_paragraph: At Pattycakes, a cake-supply store in Queens, the wares offer a remarkable account of how the borough’s immigrant population has shaped the city’s tastes.

headline.seo: At Pattycakes in Queens, Recreating Pastries From Around the Globe
headline.main: At Queens Bakery, the Art of Translating a Planet’s Worth of Sweet Confections
headline.print_headline: At Queens Bakery, the Art of Translating a Planet’s Worth of Sweet Confections
